distilleries.name: Glenfiddich
distilleries.notes: A renowned distillery known for its single malts.

distilleries.name: Yamazaki
distilleries.notes: Pioneers of Japanese whisky with a rich history.

negotiants.name: La Maison du Whisky
negotiants.notes: Specializes in rare and exclusive whiskies.

negotiants.name: Whisky Exchange
negotiants.notes: A prominent retailer of premium spirits.

whiskies.name: Glenfiddich 18 Year Old
whiskies.nose: Rich aromas of dried fruits, baked apple, and cinnamon.
whiskies.palate: Notes of oak, sherry, and a touch of sweetness.
whiskies.finish: Long and warming with a hint of spice.

whiskies.name: Yamazaki 12 Year Old
whiskies.nose: Floral notes with a hint of honey and citrus.
whiskies.palate: Smooth with flavors of dried fruit and vanilla.
whiskies.finish: Clean and crisp with a subtle hint of oak.
